description: Apple Inc. — Designs, manufactures, and markets consumer electronics, software, and online services.
Alphabet Inc. — Parent company of Google, specializes in search, advertising, and cloud services.
Tesla, Inc. — Designs and manufactures electric vehicles and renewable energy products.
Amazon.com Inc. — E-commerce and cloud computing giant with logistics and streaming services.
Microsoft Corporation — Software, hardware, and cloud computing solutions, including Windows and Azure.
NVIDIA Corporation — Designs GPUs for gaming, professional visualization, AI, and data centers.
Meta Platforms, Inc. — Social media and VR company, owner of Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp.
Intel Corporation — Designs and manufactures microprocessors and related technologies.
Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. — Produces CPUs, GPUs, and other semiconductor products.
Oracle Corporation — Provides database software, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise software solutions.
Netflix, Inc. — Streaming service for movies, TV shows, and original content.
Alibaba Group Holding — Chinese e-commerce, retail, internet, and technology company.
Adobe Inc. — Software company specializing in creative, marketing, and document solutions.
Salesforce, Inc. — Cloud-based software for customer relationship management (CRM) and enterprise applications.
Uber Technologies, Inc. — Ride-hailing, food delivery, and freight transportation services.
Lyft, Inc. — Provides ride-hailing services in the U.S. and Canada.
Block, Inc. (Square) — Financial services and digital payments company.
PayPal Holdings, Inc. — Provides online payment solutions and digital wallets.
Shopify Inc. — E-commerce platform for businesses to create online stores.
Zillow Group, Inc. — Online real estate marketplace for buying, selling, and renting homes.
International Business Machines Corporation — Enterprise software, hardware, and cloud services.
Visa Inc. — Global payments technology company facilitating electronic funds transfers.
Mastercard Inc. — Global payments and technology company enabling credit, debit, and prepaid cards.
JPMorgan Chase & Co. — Multinational investment bank and financial services company.
Bank of America Corporation — Provides banking, investing, and financial management services.
